title: Block Fortress 2
description:
Block Fortress 2 lets you build an impenetrable fortress in almost any way imaginable, then puts you in the action trying to defend it! Place walls, turrets, traps, and tons of other specialized defenses to build your base. Choose from dozens of guns and equipment, build an army, and join the fight to defend your stronghold! Put your skills as a builder, commander, and fighter to the test as you try to fend off the relentless enemies of the Blockverse!
BUILD AND DEFEND YOUR BASE Build your base using dozens of different turrets, walls, and other special blocks. Defend against attacks from four different enemy races Ultimate Hero
JOIN THE BATTLE Choose your equipment, build an army, and join the battle in action-packed first- or third-person combat!
CREATE AND SHARE YOUR OWN LEVELS Set up massive battles or intricate stealth missions. Build obstacle courses or giant worlds to explore. If you can imagine it, you can build it! Then share your creations and download others for endless replayability !

system_requirements.Graphics: 1 GB & AMD 5570 or nVidia 450 or Intel Integrated  530
